documentation.text:
@notice Returns number of created Policy Book contracts, access: ANY
 @return _policyBookCount is number of created policy books

attributes.text:
@notice Returns number of created Policy Book contracts, access: ANY
 @return _policyBookCount is number of created policy books

params._contract: is Contract to create policy book for
params._contractType: is Contract to create policy book for
params._description: is bmiDAIx token desription for this policy book
params._projectSymbol: replaces x in bmiDAIx token symbol

params._contract: is contract address to lookup for created IPolicyBook

returns._policyBook: is policy book address if exists for passed contract address, if not it will return address(0)

params._limit: is number of policy books to returns from _offset
params._offset: is starting item in array to return array from

returns._policyBooksCount: is updated number of policy books

returns._policyBookCount: is number of created policy books

create(address,uint8,string,string).notice: Create new Policy Book contract, access: ANY

policyBookFor(address).notice: Return created Policy Book contract, access: ANY

policyBooks(uint256,uint256).notice: Returns number of created Policy Book contracts address, access: ANY

policyBooksCount().notice: Returns number of created Policy Book contracts, access: ANY
